__inputs.name: DS_蓝鲸监控_- 指标数据
__inputs.label: 蓝鲸监控 - 指标数据

panels.description: Total Follower node number
panels.title: FE Follower Node

panels.description: Total Observer node number
panels.title: FE Observer Node

panels.description: Total Hot(SSD) Backends node number
panels.title: BE Hot Node

panels.description: Total Cold(HDD) Backends node number
panels.title: BE Cold Node

panels.description: Total disk capacity of all Hot Backends
panels.title: Hot Capacity

panels.description: Total disk capacity of all Cold Backends
panels.title: Cold Capacity

panels.description: Total disk capacity of all Backends
panels.title: Total Capacity

panels.description: Total Tablets
panels.title: Total Tablets

panels.description: Total not alive number of Followers. Normally, it should be equal to the Total number of Followers
panels.title: Follower Alive

panels.description: Total not alive number of Observers. Normally, it should be equal to the Total number of Observes
panels.title: Observer Alive

panels.description: Total alive number of Hot Backends. Normally, it should be equal to the Total number of Hot Backends.
panels.title: BE Hot Alive

panels.description: Total alive number of Cold Backends. Normally, it should be equal to the Total number of Cold Backends.
panels.title: BE Cold Alive

panels.description: Total used disk capacity of all Hot Backends.
panels.title: Hot Used

panels.description: Total used disk capacity of all Cold Backends.
panels.title: Cold Used

panels.description: Total disk used percentage of all Backends
panels.title: Local Used%

panels.description:
Requests per seconds on each Frontends.
Requests include all requests sending to the Frontends.
panels.title: RPS

panels.description:
Queries per seconds on each Frontends.
Queries only include Select requests.
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: 99 quantiles of query latency on each Frontends.
panels.title: 99th Latency

panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates 95 to 99 quantiles of query latency on each Frontends.
Right Y axes indicates the query rate per 1 min.
panels.title: Query Percentile

panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the accumulated  error queries number.
Right Y axes indicates the error query rate per 1 min.
Normally, the error query rate should be 0.
panels.title: Query Error [1m]

panels.description: The connections' number to each Frontends.
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: Show the number and rate of txn begin and success
panels.title: Txn Begin/Success on FE

panels.description: Show the number and rate of txn Failed/Reject
panels.title: Txn Failed/Reject on FE

panels.description: Show the txn rstatus on FE
panels.title: fe_txn_status

panels.description: Left Y axes indicates the total received bytes rate of txn. Right Y axes indicates the loaded rows rate of txn.
panels.title: Txn Load Bytes/Rows rate

panels.description: The number of total publish task request and error rate.
panels.title: Publish Task on BE

panels.description: the number of stream load tasks
panels.title: Stream Load Requests [1m]

panels.description: Show the number and rate of txn Failed/Reject
panels.title: Txn Failed/Reject on FE in 1min

panels.description: Disk write bytes per second
panels.title: Disk Write

panels.description:
JVM Heap usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used percentage.
panels.title: JVM Heap Used%

panels.description: Cumulative value of GC times	in 1 minute
panels.title: JVM GC Count [1m]

panels.description: Cumulative value of GC time consumption
panels.title: JVM GC Time Consumption

panels.description:
JVM young generation usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/max young generation size.
Right Y Axes shows the used percentage.
panels.title: JVM Young

panels.description:
JVM oldgeneration usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/max young generation size.
Right Y Axes shows the used percentage.
panels.title: JVM Old

panels.description: Num of threads of FE JVM
panels.title: JVM Threads

panels.description:
JVM Non Heap usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/committed non heap size.
panels.title: JVM Non Heap

panels.description: Network send(Left Y)/receive(Right Y) bytes rate of all device except 'lo'
panels.title: Net send/receive bytes

panels.description: Memory usage of Backends.
panels.title: BE Mem

panels.description: The file descriptor usage of Backends. Left Y axes shows the used fd num. Right Y axes shows the soft limit open file number.
panels.title: BE FD count

panels.description: Number of tablets of each Backends
panels.title: Tablet Distribution

panels.description: Disk capacity usage of Backends
panels.title: Disk Usage

panels.description:
Cumulative compaction rate of Backends.
Right Y axes indicates the total cumulative compaction bytes.
panels.title: BE Compaction Cumulate

panels.description:
Base compaction rate of Backends.
Normally, base compaction only runs between 20:00 to 4:00 and it is configurable.
Right Y axes indicates the total base compaction bytes.
panels.title: BE Compaction Base

panels.description:
IO util of Backends.
High means I/O is busy.
panels.title: Disk IO util

panels.description:
Loading rate of Backends.
This indicates the rate of file downloading in LOADING state of load job(MINI and BROKER load).
Right Y axes indicates the total rate of file downloading.
panels.title: BE Push Bytes

panels.description:
Loading rows rate of Backends.
This indicates the rate of rows loaded in LOADING state of load job. Right Y axes shows the total push rate of cluster.
panels.title: BE Push Rows

panels.description:
Scan rate of Backends.
This indicates the read rate when processing queries.
panels.title: BE Scan Bytes

panels.description:
Scan rows rate of Backends.
This indicates the read rows rate when processing queries.
panels.title: BE Scan Rows

panels.description: The thread number of Backends
panels.title: BE thread num

panels.description: S3FileReader The cumulative number of opens
panels.title: S3 File Readers

panels.description: currently open S3FileReader number
panels.title: S3 File Open Reading

panels.description: S3FileReader Read the cumulative value of bytes
panels.title: S3 Bytes Read

panels.description: The number of queries in the current query result cache
panels.title: BE Queries Cache

panels.description: Left Y axes indicates the loaded rows rate of txn.
panels.title: Stream Load Rows

panels.description: used for OlapScanner The current queued number of thread pools
panels.title: Remote Scan Queue

panels.description: The current largest Base Compaction Score
panels.title: Base Compaction Score

panels.description: Left Y axes indicates the receive_bytes rate of txn.
panels.title: Stream Load Bytes

panels.description: used for OlapScanner The current queued number of thread pools
panels.title: Local Scan Queue

panels.description: The current largest Cumulative Compaction Score
panels.title: Cumulative Compaction Score

panels.description: Cumulative value of the number of fragment instances canceled due to timeout
panels.title: Fragment Canceled Due to Timeout

panels.description: The histogram of the number of tablet versions
panels.title: doris_be_tablet_version_num_distribution

panels.description: All currently rowset number of BE
panels.title: Rowset Number

panels.description: Cumulative value of the number of fragment instances canceled due to timeout
panels.title: Fragment Canceled Due to Timeout

panels.description: Left Y axes shows the write rate of tablet header saved in rocksdb. Right Y axes shows the duration of each write operation.
panels.title: Tablet Meta Write

panels.description: Left Y axes shows the read rate of tablet header saved in rocksdb. Right Y axes shows the duration of each read operation.
panels.title: Tablet Meta Read

panels.description: Network send(Left Y)/receive(Right Y) bytes rate of all device except 'lo'
panels.title: Net send/receive bytes

panels.description: Memory usage of Backends.
panels.title: BE Mem

panels.description: The file descriptor usage of Backends. Left Y axes shows the used fd num. Right Y axes shows the soft limit open file number.
panels.title: BE FD count

panels.description: Number of tablets of each Backends
panels.title: Tablet Distribution

panels.description: Disk capacity usage of Backends
panels.title: Disk Usage

panels.description:
Cumulative compaction rate of Backends.
Right Y axes indicates the total cumulative compaction bytes.
panels.title: BE Compaction Cumulate

panels.description:
Base compaction rate of Backends.
Normally, base compaction only runs between 20:00 to 4:00 and it is configurable.
Right Y axes indicates the total base compaction bytes.
panels.title: BE Compaction Base

panels.description:
IO util of Backends.
High means I/O is busy.
panels.title: Disk IO util

panels.description:
Loading rate of Backends.
This indicates the rate of file downloading in LOADING state of load job(MINI and BROKER load).
Right Y axes indicates the total rate of file downloading.
panels.title: BE Push Bytes

panels.description:
Loading rows rate of Backends.
This indicates the rate of rows loaded in LOADING state of load job. Right Y axes shows the total push rate of cluster.
panels.title: BE Push Rows

panels.description:
Scan rate of Backends.
This indicates the read rate when processing queries.
panels.title: BE Scan Bytes

panels.description:
Scan rows rate of Backends.
This indicates the read rows rate when processing queries.
panels.title: BE Scan Rows

panels.description: The thread number of Backends
panels.title: BE thread num

panels.title: S3 File Readers

panels.title: S3 File Open Reading

panels.description: S3FileReader Read the cumulative value of bytes
panels.title: S3 Bytes Read

panels.description: The number of queries in the current query result cache
panels.title: BE Queries Cache

panels.description: Left Y axes indicates the loaded rows rate of txn.
panels.title: Stream Load Rows

panels.description: used for OlapScanner The current queued number of thread pools
panels.title: Remote Scan Queue

panels.description: The current largest Base Compaction Score
panels.title: Base Compaction Score

panels.description: Left Y axes indicates the receive_bytes rate of txn.
panels.title: Stream Load Bytes

panels.title: Local Scan Queue

panels.description: The current largest Cumulative Compaction Score
panels.title: Cumulative Compaction Score

panels.description: Cumulative value of the number of fragment instances canceled due to timeout
panels.title: Fragment Canceled Due to Timeout

panels.description: The histogram of the number of tablet versions
panels.title: doris_be_tablet_version_num_distribution

panels.description: All currently rowset number of BE
panels.title: Rowset Number

panels.description: Cumulative value of the number of fragment instances canceled due to timeout
panels.title: Fragment Canceled Due to Timeout

panels.description: Left Y axes shows the write rate of tablet header saved in rocksdb. Right Y axes shows the duration of each write operation.
panels.title: Tablet Meta Write

panels.description: Left Y axes shows the read rate of tablet header saved in rocksdb. Right Y axes shows the duration of each read operation.
panels.title: Tablet Meta Read

panels.description:
JVM Heap usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used percentage.
panels.title: JVM Heap Used%

panels.description:
JVM Non Heap usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/committed non heap size.
panels.title: JVM Non Heap

panels.description: Cumulative value of GC times	in 1 minute
panels.title: JVM GC Count [1m]

panels.description: Cumulative value of GC time consumption
panels.title: JVM GC Time Consumption

panels.description:
JVM young generation usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/max young generation size.
Right Y Axes shows the used percentage.
panels.title: JVM Young

panels.description:
JVM oldgeneration usage of specified Frontend.
Left Y Axes shows the used/max young generation size.
Right Y Axes shows the used percentage.
panels.title: JVM Old

panels.description: Num of threads of FE JVM
panels.title: JVM Threads

panels.description:
The max replayed meta data journal id on Frontends.
Normally, all Frontends should be same on this metrics, or just slightly different for a short period.
panels.title: Max Replayed journal id

panels.description:
The counter of meta data image generation on Master Frontend. And the counter of image successfully pushing to other Non-master Frontends.
These metrics is expected to increase at reasonable intervals. And normally, they should be equal.
panels.title: Image counter

panels.description: The left Y axes shows write latency of 99th. The right Y axes shows the write per seconds of journal.
panels.title: BDBJE Write

panels.description: The left Y axes shows read latency of 99th. The right Y axes shows the read per seconds of journal.
panels.title: BDBJE Read

panels.description: The edit log size for each FE
panels.title: Edit Log Size

panels.description: The edit log clean of each FE
panels.title: Edit Log Clean

panels.description: The FE collect compaction score of each BE
panels.title: FE Collect Compaction Score

panels.description: The compaction score of each BE
panels.title: BE Compaction Score

panels.description: The image Write of each FE
panels.title: Image Write

panels.description: The image push of each FE
panels.title: Image Push

panels.description: Image Clean
panels.title: Image Clean

panels.description: Number of tablets begin scheduled. These tablet may be in recovery process or balance process
panels.title: Scheduling Tablets

panels.description: Number of tablets begin scheduled. These tablet may be in recovery process or balance process

targets.source: avg by (instance_host, type) (bkmonitor:pushgateway_dbm_doris_bkpull:doris_fe_tablet_status_count{app="$app",cluster_domain="$cluster_domain"}) * ignoring(type) group_left avg by (instance_host) (bkmonitor:pushgateway_dbm_doris_bkpull:node_info{type="is_master"})

panels.title: Abnormal Tablets

panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.
panels.title: Tablets Report

panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.
panels.title: Single Tablet Report

panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.
panels.title: Single Tablet Report

panels.description:
Left Y axes indicates the failure rate of specified tasks. Normally, it should be 0.
Right Y axes indicates the total number of specified tasks in all Backends.
panels.title: Push Task

panels.description: The average cost time of push tasks on each Backend.
panels.title: Push Task Cost Time
